statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({6.38}+{5.96}\right)}={24.68}\approx{24.68}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{5.96}\cdot{6.07}={36.1772}\approx{36.2}.
